data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shaw, Matthew (2010): Post-larval stages of Ascoschoengastia (Laurentella) lorius (Gunther) (Acariformes: Trombiculidae) provide evidence for a nest-based life history. Zootaxa 2680: 55-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199315
